title: Saturday’s Championship Accumulator: 4/1 Special & Betting Tips – March 29th
description: With this season’s Championship title scrap looking like it will got right down to the wire, we have a string of season-defining battles from both ends of the table. title: Chelsea 3-0 Manchester City (3-2 agg): Blues book another Barca semi with latest win against WSL riv
description: Chelsea will face Barcelona in the Women’s Champions League semi-finals for a third straight season after a rampant first half against Manchester City at Stamford Bridge earned a narrow 3-2 aggregate success.
